titleStmt.title: Davids Psalms in metre. Agreeable to the Hebrew, to be sung in usuall tunes. To he [sic] benefit of the churches of Christ. / By the Reverend Mr. John White minister of Gods Word in Dorchester.
Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. White version.
titleStmt.author: White, John, 1575-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Griffin for J. Rothwel, at the Fountain and Bear in Goldsmiths row in Cheapside.,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with "William Churchil" as bookseller in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
